name: OCKAnyTaskStore
desc: A custom store that performs read/write operations on a task-data type.

items.name: func addAnyTask(OCKAnyTask, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: ((Result<OCKAnyTask, OCKStoreError>) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Adds a task asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func addAnyTasks([OCKAnyTask], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyTask]>?)
items.desc: Adds an array of tasks asynchronously to the store.

items.name: func updateAnyTask(OCKAnyTask, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: ((Result<OCKAnyTask, OCKStoreError>) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Updates a task asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func updateAnyTasks([OCKAnyTask], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyTask]>?)
items.desc: Updates an array of tasks asynchronously in the store.

items.name: func deleteAnyTask(OCKAnyTask, callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: ((Result<OCKAnyTask, OCKStoreError>) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Deletes a task asynchronously from the store.

items.name: func deleteAnyTasks([OCKAnyTask], callbackQueue: DispatchQueue, completion: OCKResultClosure<[OCKAnyTask]>?)
items.desc: Deletes an array of tasks asynchronously from the store.
